meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Pat Curry Cecil Reniche Jeff Slike Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1209.

td.p: Pat Curry, a homemaker from Irvington, New Jersey
Cecil Reniche, a salesperson originally from Naperville, Illinois
Jeff Slike, an ATM repairman originally from Harrisburg, Pennsylvania (whose 2-day cash winnings total $26,300)

tr.td: STATE NICKNAMES
JEWELRY
HISTORICAL FILMMS
MATHEMATICS
POTENT POTABLES
ANIMAL GROUPS

$6,900
JeffWhat is the eagle?
$5,000
a horse')
